title: A Visit to Don's Produce Arena WI

subtasks: Ensure proper irrigation system operation (water pump on tractor’s PTO)
Monitor soil moisture and rainfall needs
Adjust irrigation speed for effective water application
Set up irrigation when necessary to prevent drought stress
Oversee potato growth stages (need moisture vs. vine growth)
Provide supplemental pollination (using bumblebees in hives)
Maintain greenhouse tomato crops (adjusting vine positions, monitoring ripening)
Water and feeding systems for vertically grown crops (pearlite media, individual feed tubes)
Harvest and manage greenhouse strawberries (using stacker systems)
Operate and maintain farm equipment (tractor, water winch, irrigation feed tubes)
Manage greenhouse environments (humidity control for pollination)
Schedule and perform field activities (irrigation setup, crop monitoring)
Attend local farmers’ markets (explicit mention of farmer presence)
Share farming practices and insights with community

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Site inspection and irrigation setup
